column4: HELP!  I mounted my windows XP machine from Ubuntu 10.10 and accidentally deleted a folder full of m4v that took me forever to encode for the iphone, and I don't even know which machine I should be looking at to try to recover the files.  Thoughts?
already tried an undelete on the win machine and they don't show
so if I delete something from my XP machine from Ubuntu it is simply gone with 1 confirmation?
